titleSection.name: Tasktop Dev for VersionOne
titleSection.shortDescription: View and update VersionOne workitems directly from your Visual Studio or Eclipse IDE.

descriptionSection.description: Tasktop Dev for VersionOne integrates VersionOne's agile planning and project management platform with Visual Studio and Eclipse IDEs. This integration provides developers with the ability to create and manage VersionOne Epics, Stories, Defects, Tasks, and Tests (including effort tracking) all within the context of their IDE.

linksSection.title: Learn about and download Tasktop Dev for VersionOne

commercial.shortDescription: The product is stable and supported.
